msg: Regression test for label-end() function when there are margins on the page-master and the list-block is a direct child of a flow.

msg: Bugfix for list labels that were not properly placed when the list-block is a child of a flow and there are margins on the page-master.

msg: Notify the AreaTreeHandler about new pages being added.

msg: Add a facility for the PageSequenceLayoutManager to notify about a new page being added so the rendering statistics work again.

author: jeremias
msg: Derived from markers4 these two test cases exercise BlockLayoutManager.addMarkers() where currently some markers are added to the wrong page.
